headline: Is It Time To Reassess FactSet Research Systems (FDS) After A 37% One-Year Share Price Fall
summary: If you are wondering whether FactSet Research Systems is fairly priced or offering value right now, it helps to start with how the market has been treating the stock recently. At a last close of US$286.36, the share price has seen a 1.7% decline over the past week, a 1.5% decline over the past month, a small 0.5% gain year to date, and a 37.1% decline over the past year, with a 27.9% decline over 3 years and a 10.5% decline over 5 years. These moves have put FactSet on many investors' radar,...
